thread.title: Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board

title: Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board
text:
Australian casino boss Packer quits Crown Resorts board 7:08am EDT - 01:26 
Australian billionaire James Packer has quit the board of casino operator Crown Resorts citing mental illness, following a break-up with Mariah Carey and the failure of Crown's global expansion. Ryan Brooks reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Australian billionaire James Packer has quit the board of casino operator Crown Resorts citing mental illness, following a break-up with Mariah Carey and the failure of Crown's global expansion.
